location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident at Bushire to Captain Charles B James, Military Paymaster, Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter regarding a sum of money which had been recovered from Assistant Surgeon Henry Johnston at the request of the Military Accountant on account of retrenchments forwarded against Johnston by the Military Pay Master in the Poona [Pune] division.
